description: Try our easy to follow Roasted Cauliflower Curry recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Roasted Cauliflower Curry Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Serve roasted vegetables in cashew sauce. Scatter over coriander leaves and toasted cashews.
